snippet: A growing number of experts say that the portrayal of e-cigarettes as a public health threat is a profound disservice to smokers who could benefit from them....
abstract: New research showing vaping is much less harmful than smoking has largely gone unheeded; health officials worry lingering public perception of e-cigarettes as hazardous, partly sustained by regulators, will squander opportunity to entice smokers to switch to vaping.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of experts say that the portrayal of e-cigarettes as a public health threat is a profound disservice to smokers who could benefit from them.

headline.main: Safer to Puff, E-Cigarettes Can’t Shake Their Reputation as a Menace
headline.print_headline: Experts Say Vaping Alarm Is Overdone
